Subprime

2021

Pitch

Banksters + Clothes + Stationery = Supreme Brand Remix

The Idea

Bankster brand that features streetwear clothing with a mathematical theme and old school hi-end stationery for eviction, brankruptcy, and corporate takeover notices.

Domain Names

  • subprime.com

Alternate Names

  • Bankster Brand

Features

  • Subprime winter hat with stock market chart and logo
  • Shirt with overlays of charts for different industries
  • Offset, letterpress, engraving, thermography stationery

Concepts

Clothing streetwear with a financial math twist with stock charts and other shit like that designed up into a cool everyday clothes.
